effect.result: Make a successful DC 10 DEX Save or immediately fall prone

effect.expletive: Well crap, You pulled up lame
effect.result: Make a successful DC 10 CON save or your speed is halved until the encounter ends
You got something in your eye, your melee attacks only do half damage for the remainder of the encounter.
You lightly whack yourself on your backswing and take 1d4 damage

effect.expletive: OOF! You got the wind knocked out of you
effect.result: You become exhausted to level 1 of that condition
Gain disadvantage for your attacks against this opponent for the remainder of the encounter.
You are stunned for 1 round.
You fail so spectacularly you give your enemies hope. Your target’s allies within 30 feet gain a d6 inspiration die that can be used during this encounter.
Make a successful DC 10 Wisdom Save or become frightened for the remainder of the encounter.
You drop your weapon and it falls 10’ from your location in a random direction.
You become incapacitated for 1 round.

effect.expletive: I've fallen and I can't get up
effect.result: Immediately fall prone and lose all movement this round.
Drop to last in the imitative order for the combat and do not act again this turn.

effect.expletive: Hand bone connected to the - oh shit
effect.result: You break a bone in your hand. You suffer disadvantage for the rest of the encounter and take 1d6 damage every round until healed.
You made an easy target of yourself, allies of the target within 20’ will attack you with their next turn, unless they would suffer an Attack of Opportunity to do so
Your swing unbalances you so much that your target may take one melee attack against you as a reaction.
You suffer the effects of a bane spell for the remainder of the encounter.
Unguarded. All adjacent allies of your target may immediately take an attack of opportunity against you.
Costly mistake. Your target may reroll all 1s and 2s on the damage roll for his next successful melee attack against you.
You revealed your team's intentions. You and your allies all suffer disadvantage for your next attack.
Mistakenly strike an ally adjacent to you with your attack.
Your weapon becomes stuck in the floor or a nearby object. You must make a DC 14 STR check to remove it as an action.
A devastating error. Your opponent may immediately make one melee attack with advantage against you as a reaction.
Your weapon breaks if it is non-magical. Enchanted weapons must make a DC 8 Save and get a +1 to their roll for every + of the weapon.
You lose your grip and throw your weapon. It lands 30’ from your location in a random direction.

effect.expletive: It hurt itself in its confusion
effect.result: You immediately suffer the effects of the Confusion spell for 1 round.
Aw shit. Roll twice on this page and apply both effects to yourself.
Your attack ricochets back and you hit yourself. Roll your damage as if you had hit your target and apply it to yourself.
Your attack ricochets back and you hit yourself. Apply the maximum damage to yourself as if you had hit your target.
Your attack ricochets back and you hit yourself. Apply the maximum critical damage to yourself as if you had hit your target.
